title: Working from home isn't for me.

sentences.english: Working from home isn't for me. I always get distracted.
sentences.korean: 저는 재택근무 체질이 아니에요. 늘 딴짓하게 되거든요.

sentences.english: Going on blind dates isn't for me.
Laptops aren't really for me. Something about the keyboards is super uncomfortable.
sentences.korean: 노트북은 저랑 좀 안 맞아요. 키보드가 뭔가 엄청 불편하거든요.

sentences.english: Electric cars aren't for me. We have more charging stations around now, but is still feels like too much of a hassle.
sentences.korean: 전기차는 좀 별로예요. 충전소는 요즘 늘었지만, 여전히 엄청 귀찮게 느껴져요.

sentences.english: I know he has a decent job, but guys like him aren't really for me.
sentences.korean: 그 사람 직업이 좋은 건 아는데, 그런 남자는 나는 별로야.

title: I can't wait to move into the new house.

sentences.english: I can't wait to see what the next episode will bring.
sentences.korean: 다음 에피소드는 어떤 내용일지 궁금해 미치겠어.

sentences.english: I can't wait to see the look on my wife's face when she opens my gift.
sentences.korean: 아내가 제 선물을 개봉할 때 어떤 표정일지 궁금해 죽겠습니다.

sentences.english: I can't wait to be done with this project. It's taking forever.
sentences.korean: 이 프로젝트가 빨리 끝났으면 좋겠어요. 너무 오래 걸립니다.

sentences.english: That dinner smells delicious, honey. I can't wait.
sentences.korean: 여보, 저녁 식사가 너무 맛있는 냄새가 나네. 어서 먹고 싶어.

sentences.english: 'Baby Driver' was released month ago in the United States. I can't wait for it to come out here.
sentences.korean: '베이비 드라이버'가 미국에서는 몇 달 전에 개봉했어. 이곳에서도 어서 개봉했으면 좋겠다.

title: Do you mind keeping it a bit short?

sentences.english: Do you mind if I finish off last piece of pizza?
sentences.korean: 제가 마지막 남은 피자 한 조각 먹어도 될까요?

sentences.english: Do you mind grabbing me some coffee on your way?
sentences.korean: 미안한데, 오는 길에 커피 좀 사다 줄 수 있나요?

sentences.english: I've got only five minutes to spare. Do you mind keeping it short?
sentences.korean: 제가 여유 시간이 겨우 5분 있어요. 짧게 해 주실 수 있을까요?

sentences.english: Do you mind turning down the air-conditioning? I feel a bit cold.
sentences.korean: 에어컨 온도를 좀 낮추면 안 될까요? 좀 추워서요.

sentences.english: Do you mind if I ask you a personal question?
